reviews.review_msg: This man is the best teacher who regularly teaches at the SFU Dep't of Philosophy. Along with Zimmerman , Tiffany & Hahn one of the better SFU profs... open minded engages discourse, isn't dogmatic about his presuppositions (this affliction is going around the Phil department.. in terms of invisible prima facia reasons)
Good prof, better teacher than many tenured profs in the department... Very intelligent, doesn't let down stupid questions softly - fair marker, definately makes the classes more interesting...
